segments.advisor_message: So, tell me about, like, your job situation? What’s goin' on there? Any specific goals or, uh, things you're lookin' to achieve?
segments.client_message: Oh, right, um, well, I guess my job is kinda all over the place right now. I, um, work in marketing but it’s just not fulfilling, you know? Like, I don’t really feel like I’m makin’ a difference? I wanna, um, possibly move into, like, more creative stuff. I dunno, maybe work on projects that, like, actually matter to me. And, uh, I’ve been thinkin’ about that a lot lately.
